attributes.action: Compel ALL vehicle manufacturers to limit the top speeds of their models.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current climate of Global Warming, and also taking into account the increasing number of accident injuries and fatalities on our roads, no vehicle should have the capability to travel above the highest permitted speed limit on British roads, being 70 miles per hour on motorways.  The speed should be able to be controlled, automatically, to take account of the varying road types, and conditions involved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
